channel.title: WhiteScape Problems
channel.description:
Ok when I try to log into whitescape i get this error
[code]Starting Whitescape on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4864 Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 at Player.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.<init>(Unknown Source) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(Unknown Source) at server.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:595) [/code]
And yes I have made a char account with my name and pass... Can somebody tell me how to fix this or have it make a new char file when the player logs in?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 04, 2006, 10:42:09 AM[/size][hr]any help please?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 04, 2006, 02:10:58 PM[/size][hr]cmon anybody?

item.title: WhiteScape Problems
item.dc:creator: @hi123 hi123
item.description:
@hi123 wrote:

i Know i got errors Too On mines i cant log in !!!
